snippet.title: Chaser E3 2002 Trailer
snippet.description:
A trailer that Cauldron's YouTube channel indicates is from E3 2002. That upload includes the text obscured by black bars here: "This video shows gameplay from one mission, which was presented at E3 2002."

Source: The Beam Breakers bonus disc. The description on the back of the box: "Free Bonus CD includes exclusive Beam Breakers screensaver, wallpapers, artists' drawings, two superb trailers [actually three: Archangel, Chaser and Gothic II] and two amazing playable demos [Michael Schumacher Racing World Kart 2002 and Rally Trophy] for other JoWooD games."
